node.detail_zh: 患者為美國留學生，過往健康良好。7 月 1 日出現症狀，7 月 11 日乘搭國泰航空 CX881 抵港，由亞洲國際博覽館送院。（衛生防護中心於 7 月 21 日更新患者的發病日期。）
node.detail_en: The patient is a student in the USA with good past health. He arrived in Hong Kong by flight CX881 on July 11, having exhibited no symptoms and hospitalised from AsiaWorld-Expo. (The onset date of the case was updated by CHP on July 21.)
